title: I tried to downgrade to my pixel 3 to Android P. but P is not installing
content:
I opted out from android Q beta and then when I tried go back in android P, I download my system update and when I press install update after that phone got restarted and came that G symbol and down one line going but from past 1 hour my screen is the same. why downgrade is not installing?
Some one help me please fast.
screen got stuck at 'G" symbol and where 1 line is still going like loading but it's been now more than 1 and half hour.
please help me guys.
I'm in hurry
